title: swan97
author: swan97
content: This coin has huge potential!#TumpCoin, @TrumpCoinDTC, $DTCContract:¬† 0xAb8c98491816FEde394582f7758A5eFfeb4368d7Below is a note from the developer...WHY YOU SHOULD HOLD TRUMPCOINIn a few months from now Trump will be trending EVERYWHERE!! He will be trending on the news, social media, TV and everyone all over the globe will have his name in their mouth and in their thoughts, as he is the most entertaining and popular president (candidate) of the world.This does not mean that we won‚Äôt benefit from short term action.In fact, more people will look for Trump related tokens as the market is stabilising more and more, as Trump is gaining more relevance and popularity.Why am I so certain about our success?Everyone here knows that I do not like mentioning other crypto currency project‚Äôs, so let‚Äôs not do this again‚Ä¶ üòÅIn 2021 Elon Musk posted a Tweet saying that he‚Äôd buy a dog called Floki.Remember what happened after?@RealFlokiInu pumped to an All Time High of around 5 billion market cap after that happened just because they were the biggest and most known project in the space with a Floki related name.#TrumpCoin is the biggest and most known project in the space with a Trump related name as well.This means that your investment in TrumpCoin is very likely to pump after Trump gains more attention in the world.Why would you invest now?TrumpCoin is not just waiting for luck or miracles to happen. We are creating our own legacy with the help of our own initiatives.If you remember the very first days of our launch when many other projects tried to copy us, you‚Äôll notice that they‚Äôre ALL dead by now.None of them survived due to them not being as original and dedicated as us.We‚Äôre persistent, hard working, transparent and backed by some BIG whales.Why do you think Venture Capitals approached us in the first place?They know that once #Trump gains more popularity ALL Crypto investors will look for a ‚ÄúTrumpCoin‚Äù so why wouldn‚Äôt they invest in the one and only TrumpCoin!!!Let this sink in‚Ä¶

comments.author: Husires
comments.body: Unless Trump officially announces that he has launched a cryptocurrency, this currency is a scam.Trump has not yet announced a cryptocurrency, and therefore I do not advise anyone to invest in it, regardless of the quick riches promises they make.the only move that Trump Coin ($dtc) is starting to move is MOVING DOOOOOWWWWNNNN

Other thing is anyone can not use another person name without informing him. I guess this is a scam.

comments.author: Liliana1304
comments.body: Quote from: Husires on June 22, 2023, 03:35:23 AMUnless Trump officially announces that he has launched a cryptocurrency, this currency is a scam.Trump has not yet announced a cryptocurrency, and therefore I do not advise anyone to invest in it, regardless of the quick riches promises they make.the only move that Trump Coin ($dtc) is starting to move is MOVING DOOOOOWWWWNNNNI doubt that Trump is aware of this. The way I see it, it's a currency supporting his administration and it's conservative followers and Patriots. It may well be a another one since it's not the first Trump likeness to have been sold with the promises of it going to be a legal tender.Too bad people have been burnt as a result of this get rich quick promises they're making.

comments.author: www.Gambler.Casino
comments.body: The liquidity of the coin is zero. The official site does not open.At the moment everything looks very bad, it does not seem that there is a future for DTC

comments.author: Jating
comments.body: Lol, it's obvious that the OP is shilling about Trump coin, perhaps the question is, any use case for this project? Or it this simply a meme coin, a pump and dump project.Quote from: Husires on June 22, 2023, 03:35:23 AMUnless Trump officially announces that he has launched a cryptocurrency, this currency is a scam.Trump has not yet announced a cryptocurrency, and therefore I do not advise anyone to invest in it, regardless of the quick riches promises they make.the only move that Trump Coin ($dtc) is starting to move is MOVING DOOOOOWWWWNNNNExactly, as I have said, this is simply a pump and dump activity that we have been seeing in the last couple of days, (if there are).All major altcoin is moving because bitcoin is making a big rally. And then this manipulators chooses Trump coin to be their next altcoin that they are going to create a hype and pump it and then sold everything. And there will be a lot of victims here, those who jump the bandwagon and most likely this are newbies.

comments.author: aioc
comments.body: There was already a Trumpcoin back in 2016 TrumpCoin SuperPAC and this one *PRESIDENT TRUMP**OFFICIAL THREAD***TRUMP COIN***OFFICIAL THREAD This is another shitcoin in the making all two coins are named after TrumpCoin and Donald Trump is not aware of the existence of this shitcoin.Compared to the two coins that lasted a year this one will be short-lived because we have proven that meme coins like this are short-lived in our present time.Investors have learned a lot from these meme coins and OP is shilling it for people to invest.

comments.author: jacafbiz
comments.body: We already have a lot of TrumpCoins in the market and for a Meme coin like this to be successful you need to have deep liquidity, I doubt you have the money o back this up. Tokens like this are seasonal and I expect many Trump coins to flood the space because he is being projected to win the Republican primary everything being equal and likely the winner of the US election if it is free and fair. This is not a winner takes all, just like the recent Memes mania we had, you can be late to one and win with the other. I know Trump has NFT which is a better bet for me than these tokens

comments.author: wheelz1200
comments.body: The statement "this coin has huge potential", you can't be serious are you.¬† They literally took advantage of a movement and just used his name to garner attention.¬† This is just another scam or at a bare minimum just another cash grab.¬† Why in the world would people put money into something like this when you have bitcoin sitting right in front of you.¬† Stupid people do stupid things.

comments.author: Hypnosis00
comments.body: Quote from: swan97 on June 21, 2023, 12:56:51 PMThis coin has huge potential!#TumpCoin, @TrumpCoinDTC, $DTCContract:¬† 0xAb8c98491816FEde394582f7758A5eFfeb4368d7This coin is not far from getting into a shitcoin. I would say that developers are really made fun of for creating coins that have no intrinsic value. I won't be surprised if this would hit some hyped because of its name but I don't think this will survive and gain long-term investors. I ignore this kind of project creation. If we want to have a good investment, it should be put on potential coins, not into the projects that are just driven by such hyped. This coin has the HUGE potential to scam...that was my opinion.

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: Every time Trump plan to run for the presidency expects coins named after him will be created or relaunched, Trump is not aware of this project because it's created by his supporters who want to make money from people who support and believe in Trump, But like the first Trump coin in the market, it will suffer from the same fate and people should be careful investing in meme coins like this, there is a chance for profit but there's a big chance that you are going to lose more if you cannot dump at the right time.

comments.author: Cvetik56
comments.body: I don't think that coin is deserve our attention, I don't remember Trump saying anything about this coin, and I'm not sure he even knows about it. And that means that it might be a scam.

comments.author: siniminomorocomunisakito
comments.body: Quote from: Husires on June 22, 2023, 03:35:23 AMUnless Trump officially announces that he has launched a cryptocurrency, this currency is a scam.Trump has not yet announced a cryptocurrency, and therefore I do not advise anyone to invest in it, regardless of the quick riches promises they make.the only move that Trump Coin ($dtc) is starting to move is MOVING DOOOOOWWWWNNNNYes, Many scams and fraud schemes take advantage of people's trust and make false promises to get rich quick. Maybe I agree from what you have said that it is better to be careful when considering investing in cryptocurrencies, especially those related to public figures because the owners have not made an official announcement about the launch of cryptocurrencies as the OP said.

comments.author: FahriZah
comments.body: I think this Trump coins is not legit coins because still now no announcement Donald Trump for her officials coins is DTC and i not seen in twitter any latest tweets from Donald Trump yet and i think this DTC coins is not safe and not good for us.

comments.author: Kelvinid
comments.body: I would say it was a scam project as I don't expect someone like Trump would be able to create his own cryptocurrency. That is why we never heard any hyped about this project as all the investors also are doubts the capability of this project as well. Of course, if you are doing research, you will also find that this project is not worth investing in, but instead a waste of money. So no reason to get crazy about this project even though it was named by an influential person.

comments.author: MainIbem
comments.body: I have tried to comprehend and see if there's anything meaningful from all you written here, sincerely speaking if I am being asked to narate anything here menh I don't know what to give out because all said in this post was just a repeatation of words and nothing meaningful from all. Besides of what use is Trump to us or and his shit tokens?

comments.author: zonefloor
comments.body: No official statement was made by Trump. I think this token is completely scam. Besides, the majority of the world doesn't like trump very much, so I don't think it will make a lot of money in the long run. However, I will say that it can pay off in the short term, but I do not recommend investing much, as I think it is completely deception. It is a token created to steal the money of people who are completely in the air. Rugpull is inevitable.

comments.author: Husires
comments.body: Quote from: aioc on June 22, 2023, 10:48:37 AMThere was already a Trumpcoin back in 2016 TrumpCoin SuperPAC and this one *PRESIDENT TRUMP**OFFICIAL THREAD***TRUMP COIN***OFFICIAL THREAD Scammers are creative in the way they think and I was amazed thinking it was the first time, it reminded me of the squid game crypto scam, the one that was released when the series was trending and everyone wanted to watch it and in the end they Got Away With Millions.How a Squid Game Crypto Scam Got Away With MillionsTRUMP COIN created in 2016 and now back in 2023 at a time similar to the US elections.

comments.author: Rampagoe004
comments.body: Sorry but I think that this is a scam project. This is a project based solely on trends and hype. And will people always be like this? I mean what good is this trump going to get? I can confirm that this is a useless project that will be a scam project. Sorry if this offends but if you feel you don't give your opinion below.

comments.author: danherbias07
comments.body: How many times have I heard that "huge potential thing"? I think thousands of times and most of those coins cannot be found anywhere anymore. First. This ain't Donald Trump's creation. Second, I doubt it will also come from his team. Third, this might be just one of the scam attempts of a Trump fan who knows his way in the crypto industry. Finally, the used name smells fishy and just wants to fish the Trump supporters to invest in it. I bet there are victims now. There always is. A foolish 1 or 2 people will bite this kind of bait and thinks they are doing it for supporting their favorite. I am just glad I experienced a lot of scam attempts before so I can say never to this kind of thing. Let's use our money in a different way, there are more projects out there without a "high risk quick rich" scheme and they are more focused on contributing to the crypto industry than this.
